name: RequestGroup
title: RequestGroup
publisher: Health Level Seven International (Clinical Decision Support)
description: A group of related requests that can be used to capture intended activities that have inter-dependencies such as "give this medication after that one".

elements.name: RequestGroup
elements.description: A group of related requests that can be used to capture intended activities that have inter-dependencies.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: Allows a service to provide a unique, business identifier for the request.

elements.name: instantiatesCanonical
elements.description: A canonical URL referencing a FHIR-defined protocol, guideline, orderset or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this request.

elements.name: instantiatesUri
elements.description: A URL referencing an externally defined protocol, guideline, orderset or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this request.

elements.name: basedOn
elements.description: A plan, proposal or order that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this request.

elements.name: replaces
elements.description: Completed or terminated request(s) whose function is taken by this new request.

elements.name: groupIdentifier
elements.description: A shared identifier common to all requests that were authorized more or less simultaneously by a single author, representing the identifier of the requisition, prescription or similar form.

elements.name: status
elements.description: The current state of the request. For request groups, the status reflects the status of all the requests in the group.

elements.name: intent
elements.description: Indicates the level of authority/intentionality associated with the request and where the request fits into the workflow chain.

elements.name: priority
elements.description: Indicates how quickly the request should be addressed with respect to other requests.

elements.name: code
elements.description: A code that identifies what the overall request group is.

elements.name: subject
elements.description: The subject for which the request group was created.

elements.name: encounter
elements.description: The Encounter during which this request group was created or to which the creation of this record is tightly associated.

elements.name: authoredOn
elements.description: Indicates when the request group was created.

elements.name: author
elements.description: Provides a reference to the author of the request group.

elements.name: reasonCode
elements.description: Describes the reason for the request group in coded or textual form.

elements.name: reasonReference
elements.description: Indicates another resource whose existence justifies this request group.

elements.name: note
elements.description: Provides a mechanism to communicate additional information about the response.

elements.name: action
elements.description: The actions, if any, produced by the evaluation of the artifact.
